basics.name: Lucas de Assis Rosa
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer - Web Development, Frontend
basics.summary: I'm Lucas Rosa (he/him/his), from Brazil. B.S. Software Engineer with 10+ years of professional experience. 7+ in Web Development. I work mainly with Frontend React and the modern ecosystem around it: Next.js, Webpack, Server-Side Rendering (SSR), CSS Modules, Tailwind and Typescript. I have plenty of experience with tools like Webpack, Redux, React Hooks, Storybook, Unit testing with Testing Library, End-to-End Testing with Playwright, Design tokens, animations and more.
